name: TuChart
description: 基于Tushare和Echarts的股票数据视觉化应用。支持前／后／无复权个股K线，大盘指数，高开低收，个股每日分笔，个股前十大股东，单日高频数据的视觉化.                              Tuchart is a visualization interface for the Chinese stock market. Tuchart supports candlestick charts, price charts, tick data, high-frequency data and distribution of top shareholders for individual stocks.
